website_summaries.verdict: Despite a few quirks, this translucent powder is likely to become your go-to favorite if you like a little bit of sheer color and a very low price point.
pros: This popular loose powder has been a top-seller for decades
It delivers a soft, translucent finish with just a hint of sheer color
Available in several translucent shades, so you'll never get a chalky finish
Only takes a little powder to set the whole face
cons: Some users find the scent too strong
Powder has some fine shiny particles that won't appeal to all wearers

customer_reviews.title: My ride-or-die when it comes to finishing powder
customer_reviews.text: I have tried so many brands of finishing powder and I keep coming back to this one year after year. Seriously, I've gone through dozens of pricey brands. For the price, you can not beat it! - You get a huge amount and you don't have to apply much so it lasts a really long time - I apply a light layer over liquid foundation in the morning and it gives my skin a smooth, flawless finish. - If needed, I will apply a light dusting at the day and it still goes on smooth after having makeup on all day.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: Love this and the sifter. Longevity is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This is probably one of my favorite loose powders. Reduces wrinkles under the eye when using to set my foundation. Makes my makeup last so much longer than without. There is barely a scent which I love! Compared to the clean compact powder, I love the loose powder better. As always, Amazon ships quickly and safely. I don't like using higher end powders because CoverGirl gives very similar reults for a much better price. I would suggest getting a lighter color than what you use because it is a little darker than I expected but it's fine because it's the summer and I'm more tan.
customer_reviews.author: Jazzy Petrovic

customer_reviews.title: Translucent Tawny is NOTHING like pictured.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this powder believing that it was as light as the picture (I am very fair skinned), and received a dark tan color instead. After opening it, I thought that I could possibly repurpose it as a bronzer or contour, but this powder is GLITTER CITY. It's seriously as if someone sent me a brown container of shimmer pigments. I'm very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: C.N

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for winter months.
customer_reviews.text: i use the translucent fair (code 105) during the winter months & translucent light( code 110) for the summer months. Works great & has a nice fresh feel to it I use it over bb cream for a little extra coverage & to keep the "shine" down a little.
customer_reviews.author: LikelyOsprey472

customer_reviews.title: Been using this powder for years it’s a good value
customer_reviews.text: This powder has only a light scent and it doesn’t clog pores. I use it to reduce shine over my oily spots like nose and chin. I think it’s better applied with a powder brush rather than the cotton pad they include.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary Mulholland

customer_reviews.title: Nice color, nice powdery consistency, gets rid of the shine on my face
customer_reviews.text: Great powder. I like the consistency and the color. I have bought this for at least 10 years now. It does what I need and it does not cost hundreds of dollars [money that I could use to buy shoes ;) ] Why not 5 stars? because their plastic lid sucks. It ALWAYS breaks. And I don't carry this in my purse. I always have it neatly organized in my drawer. No kids, pets, or anybody around to use it so I'm the only one and no matter how careful I am, the lid will break on you.
customer_reviews.author: Diverboston

customer_reviews.title: great setting powder over some smaller most costly brands
customer_reviews.text: great setting powder at a great price for the amount you get. The applicator is well made as well. I used pretty much everything from ELF, Tarte, Dermablend, MAC, and others but this one seems to be the better of them all. The only downside is I have a nose like a bloodhound and the slight scent it has throws me off when applying it. If it were unscented it would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Average loose powder
customer_reviews.text: This powder is kinda just like an average face powder, i in the past used the pressed powders but like to “bake” with loose now. This does the job can’t really complain! Smells “clean” not heavily fragranced will continue to use this - I will say AirSpun for a little under the price is my all time favorite. But I’ll see how I continue to like this!
customer_reviews.author: BullmastiffMama22

customer_reviews.title: So happy with this face powder !!
customer_reviews.text: I was forced to look for new powder when Avon quit making the kind I was using. Thank you Avon ! Because of it I bought the cover girl powder and it’s so much better and the price was great too ! Has a nice scent and a beautiful finish helps cover the shine and seems to hold all day. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: J S

customer_reviews.title: Came a shade darker than I ordered
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for awhile but this was my first time ordering it here. Overall, I like the product and it works well for me. I ordered it a shade lighter than the one that showed up though, so I was a little disappointed about that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just a shade too dark but has a nice formula and feel.
customer_reviews.text: For the lightest shade, it is still just a tad too dark for my skin, but I usually wear the lightest shade available as I'm super pale. I've started pairing this with a lighter shade powder from Revlon and it works pretty well combined to match my skin tone.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: I never leave the house without it!
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing this everyday for years and I love it. I have sensitive skin so this is perfect for me because I can't wear foundation. I have really sensitive skin but it doesn't break me out. I also like that it gives me good coverage but still looks really natural and doesn't get "cakey" like other products. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Martian

customer_reviews.title: Best face powder!!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far, the best face powder I have ever tried. I do not wear any other cosmetics on my face, other than this. It does not ever look cakey or flakey. The loose powder is better than pressed, in my opinion. It absorbs my face oil and gives me a smooth natural look. I would cry if Covergirl ever quit making this! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jode

customer_reviews.title: Lasts all day!
customer_reviews.text: I've used COVERGIRL Professional Loose Finishing Powder for years. I've tried other, more expensive brands and always come back to this powder. It sets my foundation nicely and lasts all day - and you can't beat the price!
customer_reviews.author: pinkchickn

customer_reviews.title: What is this smell??
customer_reviews.text: Disgusting smell I can’t handle it. So i just threw away.
customer_reviews.author: otgontuya

customer_reviews.title: Feels like you don't have anything on your face.
customer_reviews.text: I love CoverGirl products! Very easy to apply especially for someone who's not too savvy about makeup application. Super clean feel & doesn't look so cakey when applied. Great for the price as well. Well worth buying it on Amazon compared to the store.
customer_reviews.author: M. Kirkland

customer_reviews.title: Great Loose Powder.  Comparable to the "powder puffs"-on-the-round-box brand that no longer makes "my" shade!
customer_reviews.text: Love this powder. Very light and smooth and goes on flawlessly. It doesn't cake, even when applied several times throughout the day. I previously used Coty's airspun loose powder, until they stopped making it in the regular translucent (only comes in 'extra coverage' translucent now....why??) so I switched to this not expecting the light and natural look I was used to, was pleasantly surprised. I use the #105 Translucent Fair and it is a perfect match to my fair complexion.
customer_reviews.author: zuzus petals

customer_reviews.title: Too messy
customer_reviews.text: I'm not very happy with this covergirl professional loose finishing powder I don't think it's really their fault but the loose powder was so messy that I'm better off not using it and I went ahead and got with the covergirl non loose powder that's just pressed and that one works a lot better as this one is too messy
customer_reviews.author: Mira

customer_reviews.title: Bang for your Buck
customer_reviews.text: I use this to set my liquid foundation base and the two formulas work well together. I like that there is the two-pack option as well. I use the puff that comes with the product to pat on the product then finish it off with a powder brush for a seamless look.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Rae

customer_reviews.title: 110 translucent light is a great loose powder
customer_reviews.text: The color was perfect. The translucent light 110 matches perfectly with my Medium Foundation. The packaging was very tight and secure. There was no way any loose powder could escape. I am very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Chihuahua Mom

customer_reviews.title: Love love love this powder
customer_reviews.text: I normally don't buy my makeup on line. For months since this pandemic I have not been able to pick this up at my local Walmart. It was never in stock. just by chance I was on my Amazon account and decided to see if I could order it..bam!...there it was!...so happy, It came right away, no issues...happy customer!!
customer_reviews.author: Madeline Piacentino

customer_reviews.title: Great matte powder
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this powder 3 years ago. Don't use it every day, but a few days a week and it lasts a long time! After applying a foundation, I use the powder to finish it up. Easy to apply, doesn't smell. Provides a nice matte look and holds up for hours - even in a hot and humid climate.
customer_reviews.author: SebastianT

customer_reviews.title: Love it; with the packing was different
customer_reviews.text: Love the product and the price of it; just wished that the applicator and the packaging was different. Feels like if I drop the product by mistake the cover would just come off- screw on top would be better i think?
customer_reviews.author: shakyas

customer_reviews.title: Great setting powder
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite drug store setting powder by far and yes I do like it more than airspun. You don’t get flash back in pictures with this and it goes on very smooth like an HD finishing powder. A little goes a long way with this too.
customer_reviews.author: anna

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like that this powder is translucent, and doesn't alter the color of my foundation
customer_reviews.author: RKS/jc

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is very good to use
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is very good to use. After you apply your makeup makes it look nice and not cakey I like
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I have always used this powder and I love using it on a hot day when my cream fondation melts off my face. It arrived early, was exactally what I ordered. I will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Mysterious outlook

customer_reviews.title: Does the trick!
customer_reviews.text: Use this as a "baking" powder and it does the trick. For the money, you cant get much better. I'm sure there are expensive brands that would do a better job but as for me and my budget, this is the product I will keep using.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: It’s been tampered with
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this product for years. It’s a great powder but it came half filled from amazon compared to buying it at the drugstore. I thought I was crazy but then I read other reviews saying the same thing.
customer_reviews.author: Hannahxxxxxxxxxxxx

customer_reviews.title: Tried and true
customer_reviews.text: This is a cheap and durable powder I used to set in my foundation for the day. I have oily skin and this helps keep the shine at bay. I also seal it off with a make up setting spray after the powder. Cheap and matches my complexion so I will continue to use.
customer_reviews.author: Aka: Dorothy Jean

customer_reviews.title: One of my very favorite powders
customer_reviews.text: Great powder, love it. This is my go to brand. I am not a huge fan of the “puff” it comes with, I prefer to use a brush but I still keep it in there to help keep the powder in. Will purchase again, love it
customer_reviews.author: Notta Bear Newfoundlands

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Plastic container seeker fell to pieces . Powder puff fell apart. Used this product fir years I tossed it out Have another and the plastic is breaking apart And powder puff in coming apart. Must be made in China
customer_reviews.author: f d fell

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not light
customer_reviews.text: This powder is darker than my usual makeup, and gave my face a pinkish tone. I was hoping to find something comparable to elf’s translucent powder, but this was surprisingly dark. It looked odd on my foundation because it was so much darker, and I had to use a lot to get it blended well.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Loose powder
customer_reviews.text: Thought I would review because I throught by the photo that this was their pressed powder. However, it is the messy, loose powder. Still works well esp for shiny/oily skin, but has that perfumy scent and suuuper messy if you move the container at all.
customer_reviews.author: Crysta Polvinale

customer_reviews.title: I prefer to just get translucent powder to go over my foundation to better match my skin tone without looking like I cake ...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed. I typically wear a tinted powder but in the summer my completion changes with the amount of sun I get. I prefer to just get translucent powder to go over my foundation to better match my skin tone without looking like I cake my makeup on.
customer_reviews.author: Mia D

customer_reviews.title: like foundation. But it has sparkles/glittery stuff in it
customer_reviews.text: it is supposed to be face powder, i.e. like foundation. But it has sparkles/glittery stuff in it. So every time I wear someone says you have glitter on your face. Was not my intent when buying face powder, wanted the matte look, not sparklie
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Good powder
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this powder many times, and I love it so much! It feels lightweight on my skin, and doesn’t agitate my sensitive skin. You can even bake with it! Good price too!
customer_reviews.author: Maya

customer_reviews.title: Best Powder So Far!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best powders I've found for the price. It's goes on very well right after applying foundation and lasts a few hours. You only need a tiny bit to apply in the morning with a one or two touch-ups later depending on how long your day is. Some does get on your clothes, but it brushes right off and doesn't leave a mark or stain. Since so little powder goes very far, it lasts a while!
customer_reviews.author: Schmittyg

customer_reviews.title: It gives light coverage and it's great for setting foundation
customer_reviews.text: Inexpensive and effective. It gives light coverage and it's great for setting foundation. The puff is a bit awkward (it's fluffy rather than condensed), so I use a brush instead. The color is just as expected. It keeps my oily skin matte throughout the day.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: A perfect addition to foundation
customer_reviews.text: A perfect addition to foundation. Removes any greasy or wax looking coverage. Makes adding other products, such as blush and contouring, much smoother.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Duffy

customer_reviews.title: Such a great deal!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for 50% of the price I would have paid in Walmart! This is amazing! It gets shipped to me automatically when I run out!
customer_reviews.author: tltovey

customer_reviews.title: I like that this powder is light and does not feel ...
customer_reviews.text: I like that this powder is light and does not feel like it's clogging my pores yet provides sufficient coverage. Although, I do have to apply it every few hours. If you're just looking for a top powder to put on top of your base foundation, this is perfect. If you are looking for a powder to use alone and provide full coverage, this probably isn'y the one for you.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Howard

customer_reviews.title: You'll love it this if you want a glitter face
customer_reviews.text: Has shimmer and it doesn't say anywhere on the package or description that it has shimmer. I hate that!
customer_reviews.author: mande

customer_reviews.title: though much better over a liquid foundation
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time using a loose powder so I expected to struggle just a little with the application and such. It is a little darker than I had hoped, I am sheet white basically and this was the lightest shade I could find at the time; though I can make it work. I find it to be a little patchy when used on its own, though much better over a liquid foundation.
customer_reviews.author: ZombieKiss

customer_reviews.title: My wife's favorite
customer_reviews.text: She loves the makeup, the only issue is the plastic case breaks before half the material is used
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Swain

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper than store. Works as expected.
customer_reviews.text: As expected covergirl make up product. I get it here cuz it's cheaper than in the stores near me. Been using this product for a very long time & it works as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Cierra Rain

customer_reviews.title: Very affordable and natural looking makeup!
customer_reviews.text: My wife wears very little makeup and when she does, she wants it natural looking. This loose powder goes on so light and is very natural looking. Excellent price too!
customer_reviews.author: Brian "SpookYouLaterz" Lubecki

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Wow I didn't expect to receive 2 of them for the price. I am so grateful to have received them both
customer_reviews.author: Dainalle Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Goes all over the scarves and hats I use.
customer_reviews.text: It has been going all over my clothes and, my hats I am wearing in the sun has almost received a permanent impression of this powder. It transfers itself on everything I wear on my neck and face. Totally not worth it! It doesn't even cover well. I miss my Oriflame compact powder and I'm hoping to find something better.
customer_reviews.author: KalB

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: Not a fan of the smell (perfumey), the pad or how challenging it is to get the powder out. But the powder itself does it's job.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Whitehurst

customer_reviews.title: Light weight powder that does not feel cakey or dry
customer_reviews.text: This is a very light weight facial powder that blends perfectly with foundation. I have used it for years, and I don't plan on ever using anything else.
customer_reviews.author: C. J. Crews

customer_reviews.title: Great deal on a good product
customer_reviews.text: I have used this powder for years and it still works great and is very affordable
customer_reviews.author: Frequent shopper

customer_reviews.title: Nice powder
customer_reviews.text: Best powder I have found and the applicator is my favorite compared to other brands. Only one I buy now.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie S

customer_reviews.title: Good powder, but packaging needs improvement
customer_reviews.text: Great powder as always from Cover Girl. I do agree the dispenser could be improved. You frequently get too much powder at once and have to waste when you shake off the excess. I have had the lid crack during traveling as well; it is not very strong. And I did get a two pack. Not sure if that was an accident or the description is not accurate.
customer_reviews.author: CraftyChick

customer_reviews.title: Good coverage, expected color, nice fluffy puff
customer_reviews.text: Came with a more luxurious puff than the utilitarian ones. Not sure how that will hold up as I tend to wash mine every so often, but will report back with an update!
customer_reviews.author: Sam Stoches

customer_reviews.title: Classic Loose Powder.
customer_reviews.text: I've used this for years and years... love it. I only reapply it during the day if I feel oily which is rare. I always use it to set my foundation and have always liked the sheer, non-caky result. One of the few I've stuck with... works well and the price is great.
customer_reviews.author: FramFram Minnesotan

customer_reviews.title: WORST PRODUCT EVER
customer_reviews.text: WORST PRODUCT EVER!! Do not get this product, the picture lies. When I first received the product I noticed that the color was very dark....THE POWDER WENT EVERYWHERE AND ITS SOOO MESSY. I wanted a TRANSLUCENT POWDER AND THIS IS NOT IT!!!!!!!!!! WOOORRRRSSTT PRODDUCCTT I HHAAVVEE EVER BOUGHT!!!! I would give it zero stars if I could!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: deborah

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: This one is not bad but you have to turn it upside down with lid on to get product through the holes. The coverage is nice but I don't like the smell at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Litke

customer_reviews.title: I use it as a bronzer.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this color forever. I have meduim-dark, italian skin and this powder is great in the winter as a bronzer. It does not add the shimmer that a bronzer adds, but it really brightens up my face without looking like I am going for a "tanned" look. It just adds some life to my skin. I apply with a large brush, rather than the puff provided. Would be great for anyone with darker skin. It is not beige. I would think it is more for fair skinned African Americans, or used sparingly on skin like mine.
customer_reviews.author: K. Russo

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: I've used this brand for years. Love it. Will continue to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Fowler

customer_reviews.title: PRODUCT CAME IN DAMAGED
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to receive this item, but when I opened the box the outside of the container was covered in powder, and when I opened the actual packaging and removed the lid from the powder, the inside was dented and damaged. Super disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Hayley

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Translucent Finishing Powder
customer_reviews.text: Cover Girl provides a wonderful face powder that is light and allows your foundation to show through.
customer_reviews.author: Florida Girl

customer_reviews.text: It’s a great and affordable loose powder, doesn’t show up when you take pictures. Love it :)
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Longlasting, great for oily skin
customer_reviews.text: Works well to set my liquid makeup, doesn’t make me look ashy or pale, lasts all day, great for oily/sweaty skin. Only con is it smells like my grandma
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Perfect light coverage.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful translucent color, perfect for light coverage. Blurs out natural discolorations making your skin look smooth and uniform in color. Doesn't clog pores. Excellent product. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mallory Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: No good for delicate skin
customer_reviews.text: I started getting small bumps all around my skin, I think because of some allergic reaction. If you have delicate skin like I do, I do not recommend this product at all. Instead, invest a little more money on another product
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Love it good coverage
customer_reviews.text: Good coverage love it I wear a lot of it so it doesn't last very long
customer_reviews.author: J. K.

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: Works great. The packaging can be a bit messy, but I don't carry mind in my purse so it's not a huge problem. I don't use the puff that it comes with since it's awkward to hold and I prefer a brush anyway. It does have a strong smell when you are putting it on. I don't mind it, but if you are sensitive smells, you may want to skip this product. This is a good amount of product for the money though and may repurchase when it is used up.
customer_reviews.author: talijane

customer_reviews.title: I always like cover girl make up and i like the powder ...
customer_reviews.text: I always like cover girl make up and i like the powder comfortable on my face and looks good as i wear it. No problems with the product.
customer_reviews.author: stacy

customer_reviews.title: Weightless and shine free
customer_reviews.text: Weightless and works perfectly over my foundation. The only loose powder I like.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: It's a great deal but leaves my face feeling cakey... so apply very lightly...
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Ridenour

customer_reviews.title: Great product so far.
customer_reviews.text: Love knowing I can get this online and not have to worry about going to a store and having it out. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Same product as aI have used for years.
customer_reviews.text: This product has been a favorite of mine for years. Light and easy to apply.
customer_reviews.author: SueAnn Joplin

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for 15 years and love it.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie L Caldwell

customer_reviews.title: I love it!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product and a good price!!! I will buy again for my niece :)
customer_reviews.author: Kittylover

customer_reviews.title: Nice powder.
customer_reviews.text: Have used for years. Nice consistency and works well on my fair complexion.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Casey

customer_reviews.title: Favorite face powder of all times!!
customer_reviews.text: It really lasts a lot!! I have never tried other powders since I tried this one. It works perfectly on my skin, which by the way is dry and sensitive.
customer_reviews.author: CriticaConstructiva

customer_reviews.title: My Everything
customer_reviews.text: I love, love, love this powder I hope they don't ever take this down. I use it as my bronzer and I love the glitter !!! I can not go with out this on my face... it evens everything out so well <3
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Love this powder!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this powder for almost 3 decades and still love it! I've tried others, but always come back to this particular powder. I have really fair skin and the color is perfect. Not orangey or yellowish like some I've tried. Just flawlessly blends in and keeps oil at bay.
customer_reviews.author: miggee

customer_reviews.title: Loose Lid
customer_reviews.text: The product itself functions great, but the packaging kind of sucks. The lid is very loose and if you don’t store it perfectly flat you will get powder all over your other items.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: I sparkle
customer_reviews.text: Love this powder I use it to set my foundation and it makes for a perfect match with my skin tone with that hint of sparkle.
customer_reviews.author: jodiann n. gordon

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: I love this powder. Most powders are too thick and look bad. This one is the best one I've used by far
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Jaudon-Belvin

customer_reviews.title: I love the coverage
customer_reviews.text: This is and has been my go to powder for years. I mix it with a shimmer powder to give my face a little luminosity. I love the coverage, and I do not feel as if my makeup is "done" until I've applied this powder. Great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: KiminAL

customer_reviews.title: Quick fix
customer_reviews.text: Keeps make-up from being shiny - easy to pat and swipe into place - long lasting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: I have a very oily face so I am more than thankful for this product. It lasts all day and you can wear it with or without foundation. So far does not clog pores.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Corbin

customer_reviews.title: Colors but dark
customer_reviews.text: Lasted me almost a year and a half! Colors are a bit darker than expected so I recommend going a shade darker than you would typically buy!
customer_reviews.author: Alaina

customer_reviews.title: Not for me. #1 - Smells too strong.
customer_reviews.text: This foundation powder has too strong of a smell for me. It also irritates my sensitive skin a bit. Not crazy about how it wears either. Really if I'm rating just for me, it's a one star - but I figure that some folks out there will still have it work for them - so 3 stars it is!
customer_reviews.author: Curly Girl

customer_reviews.title: Love it.  Daily use.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Great, buildable coverage that doesnt look cakey. I usually use a brush to apply, but the little spongey thing is great while out and about. The other thing is that there is no mirror, and its a little large if you're looking to use it as a compact. But I use daily, and bring it in my purse as well with a pocket mirror.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Good for all day flawless look
customer_reviews.text: This product is wonderful. As an African-American woman with light brown skin tone this product makes my face look flawless!!! Would recommend. Product arrived on time as promised and well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Ms Tee

customer_reviews.title: Works good with cream to powder foundation and liquid foundation.
customer_reviews.text: I love this loose powder. It blends into my skin and make it more dry. I have oily skin and it cools my shine down completely.
customer_reviews.author: Tasha Swint

customer_reviews.title: Good powder... defective case...
customer_reviews.text: Like the powder.. lid always cracks and falls apart before the powder is gone
customer_reviews.author: Randidbake

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this stuff for a while. I haven't found any others that fit for color and don't cause irritation.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: (Wife reviewing)Works great and does the job. Slightly perfumed scent.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I used this loose finishing powder over my foundation & it works just the way I wanted it to!
customer_reviews.author: smc

customer_reviews.title: THANKS
customer_reviews.text: I really do like this product. I use it often.Thanks.Thelma L.
customer_reviews.author: Thelma L.

customer_reviews.title: Decent Stuff!
customer_reviews.text: This is my go to powder but as a pale redhead, I wish they offered a slightly lighter shade.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: It has a very pleasant smell which is what I love and it is easy to apply and once applied, it looks very nice. BUT, you have to reapply a few more times during the day and night.
customer_reviews.author: CJ S.

customer_reviews.title: Love this face powder
customer_reviews.text: I have used the Covergirl face powder for years. I love this light but great coverage powder.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It adds way too much color and it has a very potent old lady smell.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Nail

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: It does the job. It packs on nicely, leaves a matte finish, and doesn't really crease. However, it has a strong, unpleasant old-lady smell and needs to be reapplied occasionally.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Phan

product_meta.title: COVERGIRL Professional Loose Finishing Powder, Translucent Light Tone, Sets Makeup, Controls Shine, Won't Clog Pores, 0.7 Ounce (packaging may vary)
product_meta.description:
Color:Translucent Light| Size:0.7 Ounce (Pack of 1)It extend your fresh, natural look with this luxurious powder. It helps to stop oily shine and utilizes clean Noxzema ingredients. A translucent, lightweight powder, it sets your makeup beautifully for a flawless finish.

BRAND STORY
By
feature_bullets: Contains one container of COVERGIRL Professional Loose Finishing Powder in a Translucent Light tone. This face powder sets your makeup while helping control shine, so you'll look fresh & natural. Wear it alone or over your favorite COVERGIRL foundation

You know that clean, ageless skin is the foundation of a fabulous look and COVERGIRL foundations, powders, and concealers make it simple. Whatever your look, COVERGIRL makeup will outlast your longest day, keeping your face radiant and natural looking

Whether you are going for a classic look that's the foundation of your style, trying an advanced technique, looking for a skin treatment or just to treat your skin, COVERGIRL makeup has the professional quality makeup to enhance your natural radiance

COVERGIRL makeup gives you the makeup you need to be who you are. Fill your makeup bag with COVERGIRL products for eyes, lips, and face. COVERGIRL makeup helps you achieve the perfect brows, lashes, lips and contouring to show off your individual style

COVERGIRL has your makeup needs covered with a wide range of makeup from mascara, eyeliner, & eyeshadow to lipstick, lip liner & lip gloss to blush, foundation & powder. There's a COVERGIRL product for every style & look. COVERGIRL I am what I make up
